channel.title: 508 server help adding quest commands
channel.description:
Okay Im New To Coding 508 and my 508 has a quest tab with commands were i can click it and it adds certain things.
i was wondering how can i edit and add more commands.
also how can i add commands that only donators can use?
heres a pic
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/s5cn0i.png[/img][br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2009, 01:12:15 pm[/size][hr]c'mon anyone? Help me!!!!!!!!!

item.title: 508 server help adding quest commands
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“mod_zez, post:2, topic:282335”]ok so u want it to be a donators only command?

if so um… add this code

public int donator = false;

in player.java

add this underneath those commands

if (donator equals > 0);

then your done if you have any probs
comment back and ill respond asap[/quote]
No…

Read full topic

item.title: 508 server help adding quest commands
item.dc:creator: @mod_zez mod_zez
item.description:
@mod_zez wrote:

ok so u want it to be a donators only command?

if so um… add this code

public int donator = false;

in player.java

add this underneath those commands

if (donator equals > 0);

then your done if you have any probs
comment back and ill respond asap

Read full topic
